backend.tests package¶

I am not sure if I want to keep the tests, because at this point it seems to me one more construction site that I have to maintain.

Submodules¶

backend.tests.tests_scene_handler module¶

A testcase for backend.scenes_scene_prototype and backend.scenes_object_prototype

Check if the default transformation matrix is a 4x4 unit matrix.

Check if the object name can only be a string.

Set the transformation matrix to something other than the unitary matrix.

Check wether the orientation does not accept np arrays other that 4x4.

test_set_orientation_with_non_numpy_array_exception()[source]¶

See that anything but a numpy array raises an exception.
